name: T1
comment: Temperature in solar back flow (from solar collector)

name: T7
comment: Average temperature in tank (computed from T6 and mid tank sensor values))

name: T6
comment: Average temperature in tank (computed from T6 and mid tank sensor values))

name: FlowRate
comment: chosen flow rate of the collector pump (to calculate solar gain)

name: DateAndTimeIsSet
comment: 0: Date and Time is not set; 1: Date and Time is set

name: Runtime
comment: accumulated runtime of the collector pump
